full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/1/2023 AUGUSTO CESAR SANDINO INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT, MANAGUA PASSENGER TERMINAL CUBAN TU-154 COMMERCIAL AIRCRAFT AIRLINERS DISPERSAL REVETMENTS SANDINISTA AIR FORCE AREA MANAGUA Augusto Cesar Sandino International Airport in Managua is the principal base for the Sandinista air force. The western portion of the airfield (left in photo) is the military area. MI-8/HIP SANDINO HELICOPTERS AIRPORT MANAGUA Sandino the AN-2/COLT AIRCRAFT M-1939 ANTIAIRCRAFT ARTILLERY SITE MI-8/HIP HELICOPTERS MI-2/HOPLITE MI-8/HIP HELICOPTERS MI-24/HIND D HELICOPTERS HELICOPTER AN-26/CURL AIRCRAFT Examples of the many types of Soviet-bloc aircraft provided to the Sandinistas. 19
